description: A couple is having a picnic on a checkered blanket in a park-like setting. Suddenly, the ground around them is erupting in violent explosions, throwing dirt, rocks, and even a surprised dog high into the air. The man is screaming and holding a chicken drumstick, while the woman looks on calmly with a plate of food, seemingly less perturbed by the surreal chaos surrounding them. The scene depicts a suburban nightmare where a common annoyance is transformed into a catastrophic, absurd event.
caption: "ARMY ANTS!"
